text: ya 'ayuha aladhin saddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, 'iina kthyrana min eulama' 'ahl alkitab weubbadhm lyakhdhwn 'amwal alnaas bighayr haqin kalrshwt wghyrha, wayamnaeun alnaas min aldukhul fi al'islam, wayasuduwn ean sabil allh. waladhin yumasikun alamwal, wala yuaduwn zkatha, wala yukhrjwn minha alhuquq alwajbt, fbshshirhm bieadhab mwje
